body.p: Eclim currently provides the ability to generate java bean getters and setters from one or more defined fields.

ul.li:
:JavaGetSet
Generates both getters and setters for the field under the cursor or for all fields in the specified range.

:JavaGet
Generates getters for the field under the cursor or for all fields in the specified range.

:JavaSet
Generates setters for the field under the cursor or for all fields in the specified range.

body.p: You can place the cursor on one of the fields and execute :JavaGetSet to generate the getters and setters for the field. All of the above commands support ranges as well, so you can use a visual selection or a numbered range to generate methods for a set of fields.
body.note: The insertion of these methods is done externally with Eclipse and with that comes a couple caveats.

ul.li:
g:EclimJavaBeanInsertIndexed (Default: 1)
When set to a value greater than 0, eclim will insert indexed getters and setters for array properties.
